description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This roomy version features a twill "3" patch, nodding to the number typically worn by a polo team's strongest player.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 32½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Size Tall 2L has a 34½" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, and a 56" chest.
Short sleeves with ribbed armbands. Twill "3" patch at the right sleeve.
Signature embroidered Big Pony at the left chest.
